ing: 1 (10 ounce) package mixed salad greens, rinsed and dried
des: "This is a healthy and delicious salad.  It has easy to find ingredients, it is easy to make, and it tastes like gourmet.  Try to use a romaine/red leaf mixture; it's particularly good in this salad!  You can add grilled chicken strips to this salad to create a filling main dish."
ins: In a large bowl, toss together the salad greens, cranberries, sunflower seeds and tomatoes.  Top with avocado (and chicken strips, if desired), add vinaigrette and serve.
